definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: In the beginning the quarries lay far beyond the city limits.
sentences.chinese: 起初採石場還遠離城市的邊界。

sentences.english: Behind this wall were stone quarries.
sentences.chinese: 這座牆後面是當年的採石場。

sentences.english: Our quarries are producing non-stop, 24 hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 我們的採石場能夠一天24小時不停斷生產。

sentences.english: Uncle Jim took the air rifle and went on a recce to the far end of the quarry.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆叔叔拿起氣槍一路巡查到採石場的最遠處。

sentences.english: Tabora also hosts a ballast quarry.
sentences.chinese: 塔寶拉還有一些採石場。

sentences.english: Three miles away there was a salvo of blasting in the quarry.
sentences.chinese: 三英里之外的採石場進行了爆破作業。

sentences.english: Few children go to school, spending instead days in quarries.
sentences.chinese: 村裏的孩子幾乎沒人上學，倒是經常在採石場做工。

sentences.english: The stages are aroud a reservoir, which goes through village and quarry.
sentences.chinese: 賽段環繞一座水庫，經過村鎮和採石場。

sentences.english: Able to leap long distances to close on their quarry .
sentences.chinese: 聰明的跳躍長途電話在他們的採石場上關。

sentences.english: While in prison, he performed hard labor at a lime quarry.
sentences.chinese: 在服刑期間，他在石灰採石場裏做着苦工。

sentences.english: At a distance there is already a modern quarry.
sentences.chinese: 不遠處已經有了一座現代化的採石場。

sentences.english: This may explain why almost half of the Moai were still in the quarries .
sentences.chinese: 這或許可以解釋爲什麼幾乎一半的莫埃仍在採石場。

sentences.english: In all, he estimates he has spent 2,500 hours in the quarries.
sentences.chinese: 據他估計在採石場裏總計呆了有2500個小時。

sentences.english: Finally, we ended up in an abandoned quarry.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我們到了一個廢棄的採石場。

definition: Andes mountain chain of South America
feng shui master/geomancer/stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan
38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
cage used to hold or transport prisoners
